personal.name: Sheraz Tariq
personal.title: Software Engineer
personal.tagline: Full Stack Developer | AI/ML Enthusiast | DevOps Engineer
personal.bio: Highly motivated Software Engineering graduate with over a year of experience as a Full Stack Developer. Specialized in AI/ML and DevOps with proven proficiency in Python, MERN stack, and CI/CD implementation. Passionate about creating scalable and innovative software solutions for high-growth startups.

summary.headline: Building Intelligent Solutions with Modern Technology
summary.description: I am a highly motivated Software Engineering graduate with over a year of experience as a Full Stack Developer. My background includes a strong focus on AI/ML and DevOps, with proven proficiency in Python, modern MERN stack concepts, and CI/CD implementation. I am eager to leverage my skills to contribute to a high-growth startup, creating scalable and innovative software solutions.
highlights: 1+ year of professional Full Stack Development experience
Strong expertise in AI/ML and DevOps technologies
Led multiple AI and DevOps projects improving efficiency
Proficient in enterprise CRM platform development

experience.title: Full Stack Developer
experience.description: Technology company specializing in CRM solutions
responsibilities: Engineered and maintained critical features for enterprise CRM platforms SugarCRM and SuiteCRM, ensuring robust performance and high system availability
Contributed to the software development lifecycle, focusing on building scalable backend logic
Assisted in modernizing deployment workflows, improving development efficiency by participating in quality assurance and integration testing processes

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Software Engineering
education.institution: FAST - National University of Computer and Emerging Sciences
education.description: Comprehensive software engineering program covering full-stack development, AI/ML, and DevOps practices
Pre-engineering with focus on sciences and mathematics

projects.title: Community Automation System Using Blockchain
projects.shortDescription: Blockchain and AI-powered community management platform
projects.fullDescription: Developed a comprehensive community automation web application that leverages blockchain technology and AI to streamline community operations. Implemented advanced user interaction features to significantly enhance community engagement and participation.

projects.title: AI Icebreaker Bot
projects.fullDescription: Executed the complete RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) workflow from data extraction to intelligent generation. Utilized LangChain and LlamaIndex for efficient processing and retrieval, creating an engaging icebreaker conversation bot.

projects.title: Face Recognition System Using ConvNet
projects.shortDescription: Deep learning-based face detection and recognition
projects.fullDescription: Designed and implemented a sophisticated face recognition system based on Convolutional Neural Networks. Developed advanced detection algorithms capable of accurately recognizing and identifying individuals' faces in various conditions.

projects.title: Food Recommendation System
projects.shortDescription: Intelligent food recommendation using RAG and vector search
projects.fullDescription: Developed an intelligent food recommendation system leveraging RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) and vector similarity search. Integrated Google Gemini API to enhance recommendation accuracy and provide personalized food suggestions based on user preferences.

projects.title: QA Bot
projects.shortDescription: Question-answering chatbot using LangChain and RAG
projects.fullDescription: Created a sophisticated question-answer chatbot using LangChain and RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) models. Enabled the bot to provide accurate, contextually relevant answers using Large Language Models and efficient retrieval mechanisms.

achievements.title: AI and DevOps Leadership
achievements.description: Successfully led the development of multiple AI and DevOps projects that streamlined processes and improved efficiency

seo.title: Sheraz Tariq - Software Engineer | Full Stack Developer
